name: Farmsmith
description:
64x64 resolution farming adventure game created in PICO-8 for LOWREZJAM 2022. Make money selling crops. Help out the people/creatures you encounter. Grow the tools you need to proceed. Who needs a blacksmith anyway?

I don't consider the game complete at this point, but ran out of time. :)

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move/Interact
🅾️/C - Confirm/Continue
❎/X - Cancel/Back
Hold 🅾️/C + ❎/X - View Inventory

Known Issues

Crop selection UI is supposed to open to the crop you left it on, but the movement input when interacting changes the selection.
Minor issues with inventory UI.

Source

https://github.com/Qowface/lowrezjam-2022
